member.name: T:Args.ArgsMemberSwitchAttribute
member.summary: Decorate a field or property with this attribute to either specify its switches or if it is an ordinal argument

member.name: T:Args.ArgsModelAttribute
member.summary: Decorate a model with this attribute to specifiy its switch delimiter as well as the StringComparison type to use when checking for switch equality

member.name: T:Args.ArgsTypeResolver
member.summary: Holds a static reference to an IServiceProvider. If one is not specified, a default one will be use which simply uses Activator.CreateInstance and assumes a default constructor

member.name: T:Args.Configuration
member.summary: A static wraper for the default implementation of IArgsConfiguration. Singleton instance only

member.name: T:Args.IArgsConfiguration
member.summary: An interface that will configure an IModelBindingDefinition based on a given initializer

member.name: M:Args.Configuration.Configure``1
member.summary: Create an IModelBindingDefinition. Will use the default ConventionBasedModelDefinitionInitializer
member.typeparam: The type that will be bound to

member.name: M:Args.Configuration.Configure``1(Args.IModelBindingDefinitionInitializer)
member.summary: Create an IModelBindingDefinition. Will use the provided IModelBindingDefinitionInitializer

member.name: T:Args.ConventionBasedModelDefinitionInitializer
member.summary: The default convention-based initializer. Will create and return an instance of IModelBindingDefinition

member.name: T:Args.IModelBindingDefinitionInitializer
member.summary: This interface should be implemented by any class that is responsible for initializing a IModelBindingDefinition

member.name: T:Args.FluentMemberBindingConfiguration`1
member.summary: Used for configuring an IMemberBindingDefinition fluently
member.typeparam: Type of the model to bind

member.name: T:Args.FluentModelBindingConfiguration`1
member.summary: Used for configuring an IModelBindingDefinition fluently
member.typeparam: Type of the model to bind

member.name: T:Args.Help.Formatters.ConsoleHelpFormatter
member.summary: Formats the ModelHelp data into a easily readable format for a console window

member.name: T:Args.Help.Formatters.IHelpFormatter
member.summary: An interface that all formatters must implement

member.name: M:Args.Help.Formatters.HelpFormatterExtensions.GetHelp(Args.Help.Formatters.IHelpFormatter,Args.Help.ModelHelp)
member.summary: A helper method for getting the formatted help text into a string
member.param: The data structure that contains the help information

member.name: T:Args.Help.HelpProvider
member.summary: The default implementation for IHelpProvider

member.name: T:Args.Help.IHelpProvider
member.summary: Any class that generates help from a binding definition should implement this interface

member.name: T:Args.Help.ResourceMemberHelpAttributeBase
member.summary: This attribute is a base type that is to be implemented. Attributes inheriting from this should only be inspected by implementations of IHelpProvider. If the resource is a simple string, then you should consider using System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute. The purpose of this type is to provide help information that might be expensive to retrieve. The attribute will only be utilized if help text has not already been provided

member.name: T:Args.IMemberBindingDefinition`1
member.summary: A class that impelments this interface is responsible for signifying if it can handle a switch and also to coordinate converting the value of the switch into the appropriate type
member.typeparam: Type of the model to bind

member.name: T:Args.IModelBindingDefinition`1
member.summary: A class that implements this interface is responsible for creating and maintaining the definition of its members as well as orchestrating the binding of data to those members
member.typeparam: Type of the model to bind

member.name: T:Args.MemberBindingDefinition`1
member.summary: The default impelmentation for IMemberBindingDefinition

member.name: P:Args.ModelBindingDefinition`1.Members
member.summary: The default implementation for IModelBindingDefinition

member.name: T:Args.IArgsTypeConverter
member.summary: A simple interface to impelment for type conversion from string. If a TypeConverter for the type does not already exist, this is the easiest way to do type conversion in Args

member.name: M:Args.TypeExtensions.GetGenericIEnumerable(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns a type that represents the implemented IEnumberable<> (e.g. IEnumerable<string>) Returns null if the provided type is System.String
member.returns: Returns null if none is defined

member.name: T:Args.LambdaArgsTypeConverter
member.summary: This class enables type conversion to be handled by a simple lambda expression

member.name: T:Args.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.AddMethodNotFoundMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Type {0} does not contain a method named 'Add'..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.ArgsMissingValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Missing a value after {0}.

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.BoolWithDefaultInModel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Booleans with a default value are not meaningful. If the switch exists, the value is true, otherwise the value is false..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.IncorrectNumberOfOrdinalArgumentsMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Number of ordinal arguments must at least {0}..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.InvalidMemberName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can not derive short name for member {0} in type {1}. Most likely another member name starts with '{0}'..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.MemberNotFoundInAvailableMembers
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can not derive short name for member {0} in type {1}. It is not in the list of possible members to pick from..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.NullableBoolInModel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Nullable boolean values can not be bound in a meaningful way, please consider using Boolean or an Enum..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.OnlyLastOridnalArgumentCollectionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Only the last oridinal argument can implement IEnumerable<> (except System.String)..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.RequiredParameterNotProvidedMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is a required parameter..

member.name: P:Args.Properties.Resources.TypeConverterNotFoundMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot find appropriate type converter from type {0} to type {1}..
